The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in West Sussex so far as at 02 September is 68,300 (7,872 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 28 August, there were 2,256 new confirmed cases (260.0 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 21 August, there were 2,717 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 17% (461 fewer cases).
